snippet: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta began an official visit to Kuwait by saying that Washington would continue its strong military presence in the Persian Gulf.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta began an official visit to Kuwait by saying that Washington would continue its strong military presence in the Persian Gulf.

headline.seo: In Kuwait, Panetta Affirms U.S. Commitment to Middle East
headline.main: In Kuwait, Panetta Affirms U.S. Commitment to Middle East
headline.print_headline: In Kuwait, Panetta Affirms U.S. Commitment to Middle East
